Title: Spreading Decay
Description:
<Brena turns Kargpaw's totem over and over in her thick hands.>

Kargpaw is a pawn. He isn't the source of this rot. We must find it, before the decay spreads further.

The closest tuskarr presence from here is a trading outpost, just across the bridge on the way to Iskaara.

We should check in with them... and quickly.
ObjectivesText: Meet Brena at the trading outpost.
RewardText: As I feared, they were attacked as well.
